Uses of Class
nl.esciencecenter.neon.math.Float4Matrix

  • Packages that use Float4Matrix 
    Package Description
    nl.esciencecenter.neon
    This package contains the most important classes for the Neon Library and is the root package for all the other Neon packages except for the example implementation.
    nl.esciencecenter.neon.math
    The matrix/vector math library needed for OpenGL 3.0+ functionality.
    nl.esciencecenter.neon.models.graphs
    Several ready-to-apply generic graph models.
    nl.esciencecenter.neon.util
    Utility classes for the Neon library, like a Settings file reader implementation.

    • Uses of Float4Matrix in nl.esciencecenter.neon

      Methods in nl.esciencecenter.neon that return Float4Matrix 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Float4Matrix NeonGLEventListener.lookAt()
      A helper function that generates a ModelView Matrix based on either the current inputRotationX, inputRotationY and inputViewDistance, or, if an Input event Handler was defined by the constructor, on the viewDist and rotation defined therein.
      Float4Matrix NeonGLEventListener.perspective()
      A helper function that generates a Perspective Matrix.
